**Shared Services Canada Proxmox or Equivalent Tender Notice: Invitation to Submit Proposals**
======================================

**Invitation to Submit Proposals (ITSP) Number:** SSC-23-00024786
**Invitation to Submit Proposal (ITSP) Date:** December 15, 2023

**Closing Date for Bids:** January 2, 2024, at 14:00 EST
**Drawing Game Solicitation Number:** BPM020281

**Tender Description:**
Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking proposals for the acquisition of Proxmox or equivalent solutions to support the delivery of our services. Bidders are required to register in the SSC Purchasing Portal (P2P) to access and respond to the solicitation.

**Key Requirements:**

* The successful bidder must have the capability to provide Proxmox or equivalent solutions.
* The bidder must demonstrate a thorough understanding of the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.
* The bidder must be able to provide support and maintenance services for the delivered solution.

**Amendments:**
* Amendment 001: Corrects the solicitation titles.
* Amendment 002: Publishes the RFQ documents accordingly.

**Contract Information:**
The successful bidder will be awarded a contract with Shared Services Canada. The contract will contain the terms and conditions of the procurement, including the price and duration of the contract.

**Contact Information:**
Chantal Deland
tel: 343-551-7304
Address: 400 Cooper Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K2P 2N1

**Solicitation Documents:**
The solicitation documents, including the Invitation to Submit Proposals (ITSP) document and the Proxmox or equivalent solution requirements, can be downloaded from the SSC Purchasing Portal (P2P) at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/338D6A06-47C8-4EB8-B142-E8C4EFA0E922](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/338D6A06-47C8-4EB8-B142-E8C4EFA0E922) or [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/50A45333-0C49-476C-8372-310DBBE37817](https://sscp2ps
